snippet: The former world champion Caster Semenya has been included in South Africa’s initial team for the London Games, but the double-amputee sprinter Oscar Pistorius has not yet been picked.
abstract: Former world champion runner Caster Semenya has been included in South Africa’s initial team for the London Games, but the double-amputee sprinter Oscar Pistorius has not yet been picked.
lead_paragraph: The former world champion Caster Semenya has been included in South Africa’s initial team for the London Games, but the double-amputee sprinter Oscar Pistorius has not yet been picked.

headline.seo: Semenya Named to South African Olympic Team
headline.main: Semenya Named to South African Olympic Team
